description:
It’s birthday time and you want to throw your child a party. But where to begin? Something fun and engaging but inexpensive…

Welcome to the the Birthday Party Game Plan (created by Jocelyn Greene, founder of Child’s Play NY.) Here we walk you step by step through all the games you’ll need to keep your guests engaged.

Develop a party based on your child's interests. Use their favorite movie, book or characters as a jumping off point for 2 hour adventure in imaginative play. 

Play isn't only fun it's essential for your child’s growth. Help nurture your child's creativity and celebrate their big day.
title: Birthday Party Game Plan
